description: Mypy is a program that will type check your Python code.

arguments.name: files
arguments.description: Files or directories to type check.

options.name: --enable-incomplete-feature
options.description: Enable support of incomplete/experimental features...

options.name: --help
options.description: Show this help message and exit

options.name: --verbose
options.description: More verbose messages

options.name: --version
options.description: Show program's version number and exit

options.name: --output
options.description: Set a custom output format

options.name: --config-file
options.description: Configuration file... (defaults to mypy.ini, .mypy.ini, pyproject.toml, setup.cfg)

options.name: --warn-unused-configs
options.description: Warn about unused '[mypy-<pattern>]' or '[[tool.mypy.overrides]]' config sections

options.name: --no-namespace-packages
options.description: Disable support for namespace packages (PEP 420)...

options.name: --ignore-missing-imports
options.description: Silently ignore imports of missing modules

options.name: --follow-untyped-imports
options.description: Typecheck modules without stubs or py.typed marker

options.name: --follow-imports
options.description: How to treat imports (default normal)

options.name: --python-executable
options.description: Python executable used for finding PEP 561 compliant installed packages and stubs

options.name: --no-site-packages
options.description: Do not search for installed PEP 561 compliant packages

options.name: --no-silence-site-packages
options.description: Do not silence errors in PEP 561 compliant installed packages

options.name: --junit-format
options.description: If --junit-xml is set, specifies format...

options.name: --python-version
options.description: Type check code assuming it will be running on Python x.y

options.name: --platform
options.description: Type check special-cased code for the given OS platform (defaults to sys.platform)

options.name: --always-true
options.description: Additional variable to be considered True (may be repeated)

options.name: --always-false
options.description: Additional variable to be considered False (may be repeated)

options.name: --disallow-any-expr
options.description: Disallow all expressions that have type Any

options.name: --disallow-any-decorated
options.description: Disallow functions that have Any in their signature after decorator transformation

options.name: --disallow-any-explicit
options.description: Disallow explicit Any in type positions

options.name: --disallow-any-generics
options.description: Disallow usage of generic types that do not specify explicit type parameters

options.name: --disallow-any-unimported
options.description: Disallow Any types resulting from unfollowed imports

options.name: --disallow-subclassing-any
options.description: Disallow subclassing values of type 'Any' when defining classes

options.name: --disallow-untyped-calls
options.description: Disallow calling functions without type annotations from functions with type annotations

options.name: --untyped-calls-exclude
options.description: Disable --disallow-untyped-calls for functions/methods from specific module/package/class

options.name: --disallow-untyped-defs
options.description: Disallow defining functions without type annotations or with incomplete type annotations

options.name: --disallow-incomplete-defs
options.description: Disallow defining functions with incomplete type annotations

options.name: --check-untyped-defs
options.description: Type check the interior of functions without type annotations

options.name: --disallow-untyped-decorators
options.description: Disallow decorating typed functions with untyped decorators

options.name: --implicit-optional
options.description: Assume arguments with default values of None are Optional

options.name: --no-strict-optional
options.description: Disable strict Optional checks

options.name: --warn-redundant-casts
options.description: Warn about casting an expression to its inferred type

options.name: --warn-unused-ignores
options.description: Warn about unneeded '# type: ignore' comments

options.name: --no-warn-no-return
options.description: Do not warn about functions that end without returning

options.name: --warn-return-any
options.description: Warn about returning values of type Any from non-Any typed functions

options.name: --warn-unreachable
options.description: Warn about statements or expressions inferred to be unreachable

options.name: --report-deprecated-as-note
options.description: Report importing or using deprecated features as notes instead of errors

options.name: --allow-untyped-globals
options.description: Suppress toplevel errors caused by missing annotations

options.name: --allow-redefinition
options.description: Allow unconditional variable redefinition with a new type

options.name: --no-implicit-reexport
options.description: Treat imports as private unless aliased

options.name: --strict-equality
options.description: Prohibit equality, identity, and container checks for non-overlapping types

options.name: --strict-bytes
options.description: Disable treating bytearray and memoryview as subtypes of bytes

options.name: --extra-checks
options.description: Enable additional checks that are technically correct but may be impractical...

options.name: --strict
options.description: Strict mode; enables many other strictness flags.

options.name: --disable-error-code
options.description: Disable a specific error code

options.name: --enable-error-code
options.description: Enable a specific error code

options.name: --show-error-context
options.description: Precede errors with "note:" messages explaining context

options.name: --show-column-numbers
options.description: Show column numbers in error messages

options.name: --show-error-end
options.description: Show end line/end column numbers in error messages...

options.name: --hide-error-codes
options.description: Hide error codes in error messages

options.name: --show-error-code-links
options.description: Show links to error code documentation

options.name: --pretty
options.description: Use visually nicer output in error messages...

options.name: --no-color-output
options.description: Do not colorize error messages

options.name: --no-error-summary
options.description: Do not show error stats summary

options.name: --show-absolute-path
options.description: Show absolute paths to files

options.name: --no-incremental
options.description: Disable module cache

options.name: --cache-dir
options.description: Store module cache info in the given folder... (defaults to '.mypy_cache')

options.name: --sqlite-cache
options.description: Use a sqlite database to store the cache

options.name: --cache-fine-grained
options.description: Include fine-grained dependency information in the cache for the mypy daemon

options.name: --skip-version-check
options.description: Allow using cache written by older mypy version

options.name: --skip-cache-mtime-checks
options.description: Skip cache internal consistency checks based on mtime

options.name: --pdb
options.description: Invoke pdb on fatal error

options.name: --show-traceback
options.description: Show traceback on fatal error

options.name: --raise-exceptions
options.description: Raise exception on fatal error

options.name: --custom-typing-module
options.description: Use a custom typing module

options.name: --old-type-inference
options.description: Disable new experimental type inference algorithm

options.name: --custom-typeshed-dir
options.description: Use the custom typeshed in DIR

options.name: --warn-incomplete-stub
options.description: Warn if missing type annotation in typeshed...

options.name: --shadow-file
options.description: When encountering SOURCE_FILE, read and type check the contents of SHADOW_FILE instead.

options.name: -m
options.description: Type-check module; can repeat for more modules.

options.name: -p
options.description: Type-check package recursively; can be repeated.

options.name: -c
options.description: Type-check program passed in as string.
